thread.title: Manafort pleads not guilty, faces Sept. 17 trial

title: Manafort pleads not guilty, faces Sept. 17 trial
text:
Manafort pleads not guilty, faces Sept. 17 trial 3:34pm GMT - 00:30 
President Donald Trump's embattled ex-campaign manager Paul Manafort pleaded not guilty on Wednesday to new charges brought against him by Special Counsel Robert Mueller in his wide-ranging investigation into Russian election meddling. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
